titles.title: A resolution commending the Kansas City Kansas Community College Debate Team for their National Championship victories.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/26/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the extraordinary contributions of the Kansas City Kansas Community College debate team to the city of Kansas City, Kansas, and the state of Kansas. Congratulates the team for their national championship victories.
